name: ProLounger_Tuff_Stuff_Taupe_Synthetic_Leather_Wall_Hugger_Storage_Arm_Recliner
reviews: Nice. Every time I sit in chair, I fall asleep. Lol
Love the built in cup holders and also the storage in both arms. Very comfortable recliner.
Certainly more grey in my mind than taupe but it worked fine. Right size and a breeze to put together. Will see how it wears and update this review then.

I liked the size of this chair but was very uncomfortable. I did not like the feel of this synthetic leather and it was so hard. Not enough contour when reclined, I needed pillows to have supports. The seat was extremely hard and took to much effort to bring down. Very disappointed in this purchase, I returned it.
couldn't be any more satisfying wood grade it a 10 out of 10 very happy with it Neighbours want some now

Just what I wanted for my Dad in the nursing home, just the right size for a small space and I love the drink holder and how the arms of the recliner lifts up so it can hold his Bible, very happy with this purchase, and delivery was great to!
description: The ProLounger wall hugger recliner is covered in TUFF STUFF, a synthetic leather in stylish taupe. Sit back and relax in this comfortable reclining chair that includes a storage area and cup holder in each arm.Frame materials: Constructed with a laminated hardwood frame for added strengthUpholstery color: TaupeUpholstery materials: 100-percent polyurethane with a poly blend baseThe perfect recliner chair for home theaters, living rooms, dens and media roomsWall hugger design recliner only needs 4-inches of clearance from the wall to recline and uses less floor space when recliningFull chaise pad between the chair and the leg rest to support the legs for a truly comfortable reclinerEasy to open and reach Car Door Lever used to reclineCushions are filled with high density foam, polyester fiber and no sag springsSteel reclining mechanismInsulated spring clips for noise reductionOur efficient product and package design allows us to use less fossil fuel throughout the entire supply chain than standard, set-up furniture usesVarious components are recyclable at the end of useShips in 1 boxTakes less than 15 minutes to assembleDimensions: 39 inches high x 33.5 inches wide x 37 inches deepSeat: 18.5 inches high x 20.5 inches wide x 27 inches deepStyleTransitionalMaterialPolyurethaneChair TypeRecliners, Theater SeatingAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorTanFurniture PatternSolid
